entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in wind prone areas late this morning and this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in wind prone areas this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
